main event: Observers reported seeing a round-shaped glowing object traveling across the sky over Bottineau, North Dakota in March 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as ball-shaped with green glowing edges,One observer followed the object for approximately 17 minutes,The object was seen moving from west to east and was visible for over an hour, There were various reports from policemen regarding the sighting, Some observers suggested the object could have been Venus or another unidentified object.
witness description: policemen from Mohall and Bottineau, ND
